Sentencas: This paper investigated the structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: The Ni/YSZ cermet was heated in CH4/Ar environment with a thermobalance.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: It was observed that carbon deposition preferentially occurred on Ni particles, and the area on which carbon deposited touched the Ni/YSZ interfaces.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: Meanwhile, carbon deposition was not found on some of the Ni/YSZ interfaces.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: The Ni/Zr interfaces had various defects, suggesting that the defect pattern may be an important factor for carbon deposition.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: XANES spectra showed that structural defects and C-H bonds were present in the nascent carbon deposition.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: As carbon deposition advanced, a graphite structure developed and C-H bonds diminished.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy

Sentencas: Reactants produced from CH4 cracking converted to a nascent amorphous carbon at the Ni/YSZ interface, and then contributed to the growth of carbon deposition on Ni surfaces, leading to the deposition of carbon encapsulating the Ni particles.
Titulo: Structural evolution of carbon deposition on a Ni/YSZ cermet of a SOFC analyzed by soft x-ray XANES spectroscopy
